duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist with installation, maintenance, configuration, upgrades, and administration of hardware and/or software independently in workstation support, business continuity, information security, telecommunications, and network connectivity.
Create, organize, file, and maintain documentation and interfaces with other platforms from a hardware and/or software perspective.
Attend meetings as necessary and perform other duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Must be currently enrolled in and attending a college degree program directly related to Information Systems or Computer Science.
